mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CMIS_MEM order by user_id DESC

select count(*) as tot_mem, count(case when date_format(regdate,'%Y') = (SELECT date_format(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y') FROM dual) then 1 end) as year_mem,count(case when date_format(regdate, '%Y-%m') = (SELECT date_format(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y-%m') FROM dual) then 1 end) as month_mem,count(case when regdate = (SELECT date_format(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') FROM dual) then 1 end) as yester_mem from CMIS_MEM

select '자유게시판 글' as board_name, count(if(CMIS_BOARD.board_date = (SELECT date_format(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') FROM dual), 1, null)) as cnt from CMIS_BOARD union select '자유게시판 댓글' as board_name, count(if(CMIS_COMMENT.comment_date = (SELECT date_format(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') FROM dual), 1, null)) as cnt from CMIS_COMMENT union select 'QNA 글' as board_name, count(if(CMIS_QNA_BOARD.qna_board_date = (SELECT date_format(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') FROM dual), 1, null)) as cnt from CMIS_QNA_BOARD union select 'QNA 댓글' as board_name, count(if(CMIS_QNA_REPLY.qna_reply_date = (SELECT date_format(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') FROM dual), 1, null)) as cnt from CMIS_QNA_REPLY
select * from CMIS_PRO order by product_views_count desc limit 5
select product_name, count(*) as cnt from CMIS_WISH group by product_name order by cnt desc limit 5

select user_id, sum(comu.cnt) as cnt_sum from (select board_writer as user_id, count(*) as cnt from CMIS_BOARD group by user_id union all select comment_writer as user_id, count(*) as cnt from CMIS_COMMENT group by user_id union all select user_id, count(*) as cnt from CMIS_QNA_BOARD group by user_id union all select reply_user_id as user_id, count(*) as cnt from CMIS_QNA_REPLY group by user_id ) as comu group by user_id order by cnt_sum desc limit 5

select shop_name, count(*) as cnt from CMIS_PRICES join CMIS_PRO on CMIS_PRICES.product_name = CMIS_PRO.product_name where CMIS_PRICES.sale_price <= CMIS_PRO.product_hot_sale_price and research_date = (SELECT max(research_date) from CMIS_PRICES) group by CMIS_PRICES.shop_name order by cnt desc limit 5

select '10대이하' as age, count(IF(LENGTH(member_age)=1,1,if(SUBSTRING(member_age,1,1)=1,1,null))) as cnt from CMIS_MEM union select '20대' as age, count(IF(LENGTH(member_age)=1,null,if(SUBSTRING(member_age,1,1)=2,1,null))) as cnt from CMIS_MEM union select '30대' as age, count(IF(LENGTH(member_age)=1,null,if(SUBSTRING(member_age,1,1)=3,1,null))) as cnt from CMIS_MEM union select '40대' as age, count(IF(LENGTH(member_age)=1,null,if(SUBSTRING(member_age,1,1)=4,1,null))) as cnt from CMIS_MEM union select '50대' as age, count(IF(LENGTH(member_age)=1,null,if(SUBSTRING(member_age,1,1)=5,1,null))) as cnt from CMIS_MEM union select '60대이상' as age, count(IF(LENGTH(member_age)=1,null,if(SUBSTRING(member_age,1,1)>=6,1,null))) as cnt from CMIS_MEM

select CATE.main_category_name, count(*) as cnt from CMIS_PRO left join (select distinct(main_category), main_category_name from CMIS_CATE) as CATE on CMIS_PRO.main_category = CATE.main_category group by CATE.main_category_name

select date_format(B.regdate, '%Y,%m-1,%d') as regdate, B.cnt from( select regdate, count(regdate) as cnt from CMIS_MEM where regdate between DATE_SUB(now(), INTERVAL 6 DAY) and now() group by regdate union select curdate() - INTERVAL (a.a) DAY as ragdate, 0 as cnt from (select 0 as a union all select 1 union all select 2 union all select 3 union all select 4 union all select 5 union all select 6) as a order by regdate) as B group by regdate
select member_sns as platform, count(*) as cnt FROM CMIS_MEM group by platform
